channel.title: How do i enable player drops?

item.title: How do i enable player drops?
item.dc:creator: @mc_wobbla mc wobbla
item.description:
@mc_wobbla wrote:

hey guys.
im using my server and it wont let me drop items. it says dropping is diabled, use ::empty to empty your inventory. so basically i just cant drop anything
ive tried the code ::resetdrops , and theres a message saying drops are enabled, but i still cant drop. it wont let me drop on mod, admin, or normal players. please heelp?

this is what it says in client.java …

	}
public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {
	// misc.printlnTag("droppeditem ["+playerItems[slot]+"] which is
	// ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]");
	boolean a = true;

if (playerRights >= 0) {
  sM("Dropping has been disabled, use ::empty to delete your inventory instead.");
  return ;
}

is there something in this that i have to change ?
i’ve tried changing boolean a = true; to boolean a = false;
still the same.
i dont know what to do. heeeelpp D:

Read full topic
item.source: How do i enable player drops?
